param.name: grfFlags

span.span: Specifies whether the Running Object Table's (ROT) reference to is weak or strong, and controls access to the object through its entry in the ROT.

param.name: punkObject
param.span: Ссылка на объект, зарегистрированный как выполняемый.

span.span: Reference to the object being registered as running.
Reference to the moniker that identifies .

span.span: Reference to a 32-bit value that can be used to identify this ROT entry in subsequent calls to or .

summary.span: Регистрирует переход предоставленного объекта в состояние выполнения.

span.span: Registers that the supplied object has entered the running state.
